metadata.title: CVE-2016-10122 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Firejail does not properly clean environment variables, which allows local users to gain privileges.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10122` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.44.2-2
firejail-profiles - 0.9.44.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.44.2-2').
